titles.title: Just As I Am/I Come Broken

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Just as I am, without one plea But that Thy blood was shed for me And that thou bidst me come to thee O Lamb of God, I come, I come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Just as I am, and waiting not To rid my soul of one dark blot To Thee whose blood can cleanse each spot O Lamb of God, I come, I come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I come broken to be mended I come wounded to be healed I come desperate to be rescued I come empty to be filled I come guilty to be pardoned By the blood of Christ the Lamb And I’m welcomed with open arms Praise God, just as I am{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Just as I am, I would be lost But mercy and grace my freedom bought And now to glory in Your cross Oh Lamb of God I come, I come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I come broken to be mended I come wounded to be healed I come desperate to be rescued I come empty to be filled I come guilty to be pardoned By the blood of Christ the Lamb And I’m welcomed with open arms Praise God, just as I am{/lang-eng}
